name: Tin Anniversary
description:
Objective: Play the role of soulmates and spend ten years together.

Playtime: 10 to 30 minutes

Controls

Keyboard:

  • Arrow keys: movement
  • Shift: hold it while moving to run
  • Enter / Space: confirm, interact

Touch:

  • Tap destination to move there
  • Tap target to interact with it
  • Tap choice to choose it and again to confirm
